About Me

Let me tell you about few things

BIO

I am an Electronics and Communication Engineer. I did my engineering in Tribhuvan University, Nepal. I am more inclined towards progaramming. I do it because its fun.

Hobby

Beaware of hobby that eats.

My personal hobby is silence. I like to be within the heart of nature, close my eyes and forget this chaos. I also like to eat and sleep. In fact I can sleep continuously for 18 hours straight. I can also awake 36 hours straight (if necessary).

Languages

Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute

I can speak English,Hindi and Nepali only. But i can write in HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, REACT, JAVA, C, C++
